# Get All Compatible Version IDs for a Game Center Enabled Version | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ Get All Compatible Version IDs for a Game Center Enabled Version ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions)

-  Get All Compatible Version IDs for a Game Center Enabled Version 

Web Service Endpoint# Get All Compatible Version IDs for a Game Center Enabled Version

App Store Connect API 1.2–3.0DeprecatedDeprecated

This endpoint is deprecated.

## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterEnabledVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibleVersions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterEnabledVersionCompatibleVersionsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterenabledversioncompatibleversionslinkagesresponse)`OK`
